\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 79189}

\subsection*{Never Had a Problem}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{GershonTwan}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 300 mg & oral & Pharms - Fluvoxamine & daily\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &  repeated & smoked & Cannabis & plant material\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 225.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have OCD and have been taking my prescribed Fluvoxamine (Luvox), 300mg daily, for several years. I also smoke marijuana regularly and I have never had a problem or `bad trip'. Blunt after blunt, bong, vape or j, never had a problem.
